alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 10:26PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Daniels, Roosevelt, eastern Valley, Sheridan, northeastern McCone, northwestern Dawson and northwestern Richland Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1025 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Westby to 9 miles west of Culbertson. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Point, Plentywood, Scobey, Poplar, Culbertson, Brockton, Medicine Lake, Froid, Westby, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Port Of Whitetail, Madoc, Bredette, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Whitetail, Vida and Outlook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
